mapper.select: SELECT N_INSPECTION_REPORT_ID ,N_MOB_DEST_HOST_ID ,DT_INSPECTION_TIME ,VC_MAINT_ACOUNT ,VC_MAINT_USER ,DT_GENERATE_TIME ,VC_INSPECTION_IS_EXCEPTION ,VC_INSPECTION_COMPLETE FROM T_INSPECTION_REPORT WHERE VC_INSPECTION_IS_EXCEPTION IS NULL AND VC_INSPECTION_COMPLETE IS NULL

SELECT N_INSPECTION_RECORDS_ID ,N_INSPECTION_REPORT_ID ,VC_CHECK_ITEM ,VC_CHECK_POINT ,VC_CHECK_NOTE ,VC_OPER_NOTE ,VC_IS_EXCEPTION ,VC_CHECK_RESULT ,VC_PROTO_DATA ,VC_DEAL_RESULT ,VC_INSPECTION_TYPE ,DT_ADD_TIME ,VC_CHECK_CODE ,VC_CHECK_COMPLETE FROM T_INSPECTION_RECORDS WHERE N_INSPECTION_REPORT_ID = #{reportID}
